p: Typically, PBS is employed in medical equipment and in the food industry, where sterile conditions together with biodegradability are usually required and the safety and shelf-life of food products must be ensured/improved. In these regards, antimicrobial properties are added to the material by the addition of antimicrobial agents. Those additives can be included in the polyester matrix to achieve the desired activity through the migration of the agent, or can be bounded chemically to its surface through functionalization, as stated for the above-reviewed polymers.
